name: National Geographic Guide to National Historic Sites of Canada
categories: Guide to National Historic Sites of Canada
description: The official companion book to Canada's 150th anniversary, it celebrates the historic sites that are key to the nation's story. It featrues 236 national historic sites of Parks Canada, with full-colour photographs, maps, lodgings, activities, re-enactments and contact information.  Enjoy Canada's birthday by exploring its heritage and historic sites.
